interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  110  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Reset "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first weekday on or after Day 110.

progression.synopsis: Ami , having interrupted some philosophical commentary about life and death, says that the interaction between Sensei and Maya is a little different â€” it's a more comfortable sort of hate. Sensei says that Maya reset the world for him, which Ami doesn't understand. Ami says that not even her best friend is going to steal her uncle away, but Maya assures her that she has nothing to fear in that respect. They realise that they are late for school. Before going into class, Sensei asks Maya if they are just going to ignore the reset, and Maya says "yes".

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
